member.name: M:GuiCookie.Input.InputManager.FindMousedOverWithComponent``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{GuiCookie.Elements.Element},GuiCookie.Elements.Element)
member.summary: Finds the belonging to an furthest removed from the root-level that is moused over.
member.param: The element container to check first.
The element to ignore, or null if no elements are to be ignored.
member.returns: The version of the moused over component.
member.remarks: Recursively calls upon this function in order to perform the search. The recursion happens before the component check, so elements with no children are checked first, then their parents, and so on.

member.name: M:GuiCookie.Input.InputManager.FindInBoundsWithInterfacedComponent``1(GuiCookie.DataStructures.ElementContainer,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Rectangle,GuiCookie.Elements.Element)

member.typeparam: The type of interface to find.
member.param: The element container to check first.
The bounds to check.
The element to ignore, or null if no elements are to be ignored.
member.returns: The interfaced version of the moused over component.
member.remarks: Recursively calls upon this function in order to perform the search. The recursion happens before the component check, so elements with no children are checked first, then their parents, and so on.
